nodes.text: Group One was the designation given to one of the task forces making up Warlord Zsinj's armada in the years following the former Imperial admiral's breakaway from the Galactic Empire. It was composed of the Victory-class Star Destroyer Serpent's Smile, the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Red Gauntlet, the Carrack-class light cruiser Blood Gutter and the Executor-class Star Dreadnought Iron Fist, Zsinj's flagship. Several other unspecified starships were also allocated to the group, which fought in a reduced size at the Battle of Vahaba, where Serpent's Smile and Red Gauntlet were lost, and later at the Battle of Selaggis.
